```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r autoplot.breakpoints, cache = TRUE}
library(strucchange)
bp.nile <- breakpoints(Nile ~ 1)
autoplot(bp.nile)
autoplot(bp.nile, is.date = TRUE)
autoplot(breakpoints(bp.nile, breaks = 2), data = Nile)



```
